title: Vision in mathematics: linear programming
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission, ABC-TV (Australia) and John Walker
brief_description: Examines ideas leading to consideration of linear programming, such as the values of various combinations of coins. Also shows the sequence of operations in preparing a linear program for the computer.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Broadcasting Commission, ABC-TV (Australia) and John Walker
